alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 11:40PM PST until December 01 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST THURSDAY ABOVE 500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Lower Columbia. * WHEN...Until noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevated portions of Highway 30 through the Lower Columbia will likely be impacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington:
